trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties for all glyph classes that an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> displays when it is selected on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos e propriedades para todas as classes de glifo que um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> exibe quando ele é selecionado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Some glyphs that are displayed on an activity designer can be selected by the user while others cannot.
trans-unit.target: Alguns glifos que são exibidos em um designer de atividade podem ser selecionados pelo usuário, enquanto outros não.

trans-unit.source: When a user selects a glyph that can be selected, the glyph changes appearance on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando um usuário seleciona um glifo que pode ser selecionado, o glifo altera aparência na superfície de design de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph> class is the base class for all glyph classes that change appearance when a user selects it on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph> classe é a classe base para todas as classes de glifo que alteram a aparência quando um usuário seleciona-o na superfície de design de atividade.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph" />, you must override the following member: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph.IsPrimarySelection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph" />, você deve substituir o membro a seguir: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph.IsPrimarySelection" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which the selection glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual o glifo de seleção é associado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the selection glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar se o glifo de seleção aparece na superfície do designer de atividade; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the selection glyph on the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites para o glifo de seleção no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do glifo.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph.GetBounds%2A> returns a rectangle one-and-one-half times the size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Bounds%2A> of `designer`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph.GetBounds%2A> retorna um retângulo um-e-meia o tamanho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Bounds%2A> de `designer`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which the selection glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> ao qual o glifo de seleção é associado.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that represents the selected glyph's grab handles.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de retângulos que representa as alças de pega do glifo selecionado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array of the grab handles to display on the selected glyph.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> das alças de pega a ser exibida no glifo selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Grab handles are the small boxes on the edge of a selected glyph that a user can grab and move to drag or resize the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Identificadores de captura são as caixas pequenas na borda de um glifo selecionado que um usuário possa capturar e mover para arraste ou redimensione o glifo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the selection glyph is the primary of all selected glyphs on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituída em uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se o glifo de seleção é o primário entre todos os glifos selecionados na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the selection glyph is the primary selected glyph on the activity designer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o símbolo de seleção é o principal glifo selecionado no designer de atividade; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para executar tarefas de preenchimento e de desenho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que o glifo aparece na superfície de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> to use to access ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> a ser usado para acessar configurações de propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> do qual obter informações sobre ações do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas necessárias para renderizar o glifo na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph.OnPaint%2A> draws all elements of the glyph that the user selects, including the glyphs grab handles.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph.OnPaint%2A> Desenha todos os elementos do glifo selecionado pelo usuário, incluindo as glifos captura alças.

trans-unit.source: Gets the view priority of the glyph on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a prioridade de exibição do glifo no designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the view priority of the glyph on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa a prioridade de exibição do glifo no designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The possible priority settings are defined by the following <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> fields:
trans-unit.target: As configurações de prioridade possíveis são definidas pela seguinte <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> campos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.HighestPriority>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.LowestPriority>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.NormalPriority>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.HighestPriority>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.LowestPriority> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.NormalPriority>.
